priceAlerts.title: Custom Price Alerts
priceAlerts.description: Set alerts when a stock price goes above or below a level you choose. Upper and lower thresholds, easy to edit per ticker. Cooldown period prevents notification spam (configurable). First-check protection avoids false alerts from price gaps.

whatsappAlerts.title: WhatsApp Notifications
whatsappAlerts.description: WhatsApp messages are fast, personal, and always visible. Instant delivery with clean, readable alert format. Windows Toast Notifications as backup. Consolidated notifications—multiple alerts combined into one per check cycle.

multiCurrency.title: Multi-Currency Display

backgroundService.title: Background Service

marketAware.title: Market-Aware Monitoring

whatIs.title: What is an API key?
whatIs.description: An API key is like a password that allows AI StockAlert to request stock prices from Finnhub.

whyNeed.title: Why do I need one?
whyNeed.description: AI StockAlert uses a Bring Your Own API Key model. This means you can usually use Finnhub's free tier, you stay in control of your data usage, and there are no hidden data fees.

isSafe.title: Is it safe?
isSafe.description: Yes. Your API key is stored locally on your computer, never shared or sold, and used only to request market data from Finnhub.

steps.title: Step-by-step: Get your free Finnhub API key

step2.title: Create an account
step2.description: If you don't already have one, click Sign Up and complete the registration.

step3.title: Find your API key
step3.description: Once logged in, you'll see your API Key on the dashboard.

step4.title: Copy the key
step4.description: Click Copy (or highlight it and press Ctrl+C).

step5.title: Paste the key into AI StockAlert
step5.description: Open AI StockAlert → Settings → Market Data → Paste your API key → Test Connection → Save

step6.title: Confirm it works
step6.description: If the test succeeds, you're ready to create alerts.

invalidKey.title: Invalid API key

step1.title: Download the Installer
step1.description: Click the download button above to save the AI StockAlert installer (.exe) to your computer. The file is about 22 MB and typically downloads in under a minute.

step2.title: Run the Installer
step2.description: Locate the downloaded file (usually in your Downloads folder) and double-click to run it. If Windows SmartScreen appears, click 'More info' then 'Run anyway' — the installer is digitally signed and safe.

step3.title: Complete Setup
step3.description: Follow the installation wizard: accept the license agreement, choose your install location (or use the default), and click Install. The process takes about 30 seconds.

step4.title: Launch & Configure
step4.description: Open AI StockAlert from your Start menu or desktop shortcut. On first launch, go to Settings → Market Data to enter your Finnhub API key. Then add your first stock symbols and set your price alert thresholds.

q1.question: Is AI StockAlert really free?
q1.answer: Yes! The basic version of AI StockAlert is completely free with no time limits. Premium features are available for power users who need more.

q2.question: Does it work on Mac or Linux?
q2.answer: Currently, AI StockAlert is only available for Windows. Mac and Linux versions are on our roadmap for future development.

q3.question: How often is market data updated?
q3.answer: Market data is updated in real-time during market hours, with a minimal delay of 1-2 seconds for most quotes.

q4.question: Can I use it with multiple monitors?
q4.answer: Absolutely! AI StockAlert is designed to work great with multi-monitor setups. You can position alerts on any screen.

overview.title: 1. Overview
overview.content: AI StockAlert is committed to protecting your privacy. This policy explains what information we collect, how we use it, and your rights regarding your data. We believe in transparency and minimal data collection.

collection.title: 2. Information We Collect
collection.content: We collect minimal data necessary to provide and improve our service:

items.usage: Anonymous usage statistics (features used, error reports)
items.device: Basic device information (OS version, app version)

items.stocks: Your specific stock watchlists or portfolio data
items.alerts: Your alert configurations or trading strategies

localStorage.title: 4. Local Data Storage
localStorage.content: All your watchlists, alerts, and preferences are stored locally on your device. This data never leaves your computer and is not transmitted to our servers. You maintain complete control over your data.

thirdParty.title: 5. Third-Party Services
thirdParty.content: AI StockAlert uses third-party APIs to fetch real-time market data. These providers have their own privacy policies. We do not share any personal information with these providers; only anonymous market data requests are made.

security.title: 6. Data Security
security.content: We implement industry-standard security measures to protect any data we do collect. All network communications use encrypted HTTPS connections. Your local data is stored using standard Windows security mechanisms.

children.title: 7. Children's Privacy
children.content: AI StockAlert is not intended for use by children under 18. We do not knowingly collect information from children. If you believe a child has provided us with information, please contact us immediately.

changes.title: 8. Changes to This Policy
changes.content: We may update this privacy policy from time to time. We will notify users of any material changes through the application or our website. Your continued use of AI StockAlert after changes constitutes acceptance.
